name: bathymetrically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the study or measurement of the depth of water in an ocean, sea, or lake: The water samples were retrieved from three bathymetrically different zones. Less than 30% of the seabed in these waters has been bathymetrically surveyed at high resolution. Related word
bathymetry
More examplesFewer examplesCoral on the ocean floor had made for a bathymetrically complex voyage in the submarine. The wreckage of the ship had come to a rest in a part of the ocean that was bathymetrically challenging to explore.
